ai-tha-ap73:1.3_0: I cry out at the very moment.
ai-tha-ap73:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap73:2.4_0: this is the fruit of a Shrine.
ai-tha-ap73:4.3_0: I’ve realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap73:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nāgasamāla.
ai-tha-ap73:6.1_0: first Elder Nāgasamāla was the first,
